job.title: Software Engineer--Back End
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer & Network Security
job.description: Imagine a world dedicated to Security Without Compromise Synack headquartered in Silicon Valley with regional offices around the world protects leading global organizations by reducing companies security risk and increasing their resistance to cyber attack How do we do this By utilizing the worlds best and most trusted team of ethical hackers who test through our powerful and controlled platform to deliver real security without compromise At Synack we arent afraid to think outside the box or take on big challenges Backed by toptier venture capital firms including Kleiner Perkins Caufield ampamp Byers Microsoft and Google Ventures Synacks mission is to leverage global security talent coupled with advanced technology to help enterprises discover security vulnerabilities before they become business problems Discover the possibilities at SynackltbrgtltbrgtThis remote role is a unique opportunity to help build platforms that will revolutionize cyber security As a Back End Software Engineer you will have no shortage of interesting and challenging projects to work on You love to learn are excited about cybersecurity and want to be part of our fastpaced collaborative team making an immediate impact by building scalable web applications Sounds interesting Keep readingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtHeres What Youll DoltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtExtract features from a Ruby on Rails monolith into highly available fault tolerant servicesltligtltligtDesign and develop fault tolerant high availability systems that can elegantly deal with disruptions in serviceltligtltligtCollaborate with engineers across the companyltligtltligtHave a voice on architecture implementation and engineering processltligtltligtIdentify best practices and areas for improvement and drive those initiativesltligtltligtWork closely with our product and design teams to define feature specificationsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtHeres What Youll NeedltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBS degree in CS or equivalent experienceltligtltligt3 years of experience in a Ruby on Rail environmentltligtltligtExperience using various database systems such as PostgreSQLltligtltligtExperience with unit and integration tests using technologies such as Rspec and CapybaraltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtBonus PointsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtExperience with Go in a production environment is a big plus If you dont know Go you can learn it hereltligtltligtExperience optimizationltligtltligtExperience working with websocketltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtReady to join usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtSynack is committed to embracing diversity Our people are our strength Each
